snippet: San Francisco complemented its ace, Madison Bumgarner, by agreeing with Samardzija on a five-year, $90 million contract.
abstract: San Francisco Giants sign free agent pitcher Jeff Samardzija to 5-year, $90 million contract.
lead_paragraph: San Francisco complemented its ace, Madison Bumgarner, by agreeing with Samardzija on a five-year, $90 million contract.

headline.main: Giants Add Samardzija to Bolster Pitching Staff
headline.print_headline: Giants Add Samardzija to Bolster Pitching Staff
